title: Non-Ranked Matchmaking
body:
Personally 1 thing i dont like about league, and its probably the only thing. is the non-ranked matchmaking.

Its quick and easy which is good, however i reccommend that it becomes similar to ranked.
not so much draft pick (although that would be a nice addition, but more so a pick lane prior to queue feature.

i think this will greatly improve the community and stop the "mid or feed" aspects.

replies.body: The thing is if they make it like ranked, the queue times is gonna be so much longer and take like 3 minutes because everyone wants mid, top etc. By having this normal queue it doesn't take too long for the client to match people with you
Once apon a time, OCE had Normal Draft, ~~and everyone lived happily ever after.~~
